author: Michelle Grattan
title: With the virus curve flattened, Morrison is turning his attention to a different, trickier curve
description: Out of a pandemic crisis has come what is — in theory — an extraordinary opportunity for Scott Morrison's Government to reshape Australia's economic landscape, writes Michelle Grattan.
content:
Posted 
April 24, 2020 09:57:10
With the coronavirus curve flattened, Scott Morrison is now hunting for steroids to drive up the curve of Australia's national productivity.
The out-of-the-blue pandemic confronted the Prime Minister with health and economic… [+6569 chars]
